attributes.action: ask Kinder to consider reintroducing their Kinder Milk Slice to the UK market.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that this is a very good product with a huge potential market. They are currently available in France, but this is a bit of a trek! I think Kinder are missing out on a big opportunity and one that the government should encourage for increased tax revenue.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
